alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau; Perry; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:41PM CDT until May 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Thebes Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau .Recent heavy rainfall upstream will gradually move water levels from minor to moderate flood stage at Cape Girardeau and Thebes early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, The flood gate at Broadway closes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 34.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 38.0 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
